posts.post_content: Selling   1909 Wolverine  George Mullin Post Card--Oct. 27 1909--Dated 10-21-09---Great Content---Front states--The Big Fellow Shut them out in one game anyway.--Back  root for the Red Sox, If you want to but don't forget Detroit.  It was awful but its all over now----check scans--- $200---thanks,  Don
